title: Black Fly Rum Pina Colada

title: No Boats On Sunday Wild Strawberry Rhubarb
ec_shortdesc: No Boats' name pays tribute to when Halifax was Canada's most active gateway port, and the importance of taking time away from a hectic work week to unwind. This new spiked seltzer's flavours include fresh wild strawberries and sugar steeped rhubarb. Pair tonight with grilled chicken and rhubarb barbecue sauce.
